Innovation is helping get us through this pandemic and now is the time we need to be investing in more cures, not less. There are plenty of bipartisan solutions that would lower the cost of prescription drugs, but instead Speaker Pelosi is playing politics.

H.R. 1425 would move us towards government-controlled health care, force the government to pick winners and losers, and result in fewer cures coming to the market. That’s the exact opposite of what we should be focused on right now.
